plugins.prepareCmd: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('public/manifest.json')); manifest.version = '${nextRelease.version}'; fs.writeFileSync('public/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '\n');" && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../CleanClip-${nextRelease.version}.zip .
